pages.text: Torches have one crucial weakness: you can only place them when you're already standing in the dark. In contrast the Radiance Staff can place lights far away and in the air, illuminating large caverns at a distance.$(br)As a final goodie, these lights are invisible, making them great for illuminating your structures atmospherically.

pages.title: 基座配方
pages.text: Right click placed lights with the staff to adjust the emitted light level.$(br)They can even be summoned under water.
